divs: Sighting Detailsit was after midnight i was out having a smoke as always i was looking to the sky it was a cloudy night low clouds there was a space between the clouds then i saw it a coin shaped ufo bight light all around it white color i would say around 30 meters in diameter saw it moving behaind the space in the clouds for about 2 seconds and it just moved behind the clouds it moved really fast amazing!!!
trends: There has been one other sighting in Safford
There were no other sightings in Safford on or around April 24th 2011
